name: vscode-apl-language-client
description: APL Language Server client for VS Code

apl.server.maxWS.description: The memory limit of the APL language server. [Number][M|G]. Use '-1' to allow unlimited use of the RAM (default is 4G).

apl.server.executablePath.description: The full path to a Dyalog executable (including the name of the binary).

apl.server.dyalogEnvVars.description: Optional environment variables for the interpreter's environment (might be used for configuration)

apl.server.wsPath.description: The full path to a Language server workspace.

apl.server.prefixCompleteCharacters.description: Prefix character(s) used for entering APL primitives.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run update-vscode && npm run compile
